thread.title: Mr & Mrs Allen-lloyd
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mr & Mrs Allen-lloyd

author: Mr & Mrs Allen-lloyd
title: Mr & Mrs Allen-lloyd
text: Very happy with the blinds and the after service I received. I would recommend if you want blinds for your home. I needed after purchase help and they were very helpful. Arrived on time well packaged. great quality. Also a very good choice of blinds.
